title: #303 - Leon Trotsky Part 2: Permanent Revolution
itunes:title: #303 - Leon Trotsky Part 2: Permanent Revolution
description: Continuing their series on Mr. Trotsky, the boys get into the nitty gritty of his particular brand of revolutionary socialism, i.e. Trotskyism. They also discuss Trotsky's military career and the first grumblings of discontent between him and a certain Joseph Stalin.

itunes:author: Drunken Philosophy
